I do not have time to chat. Sorry.
Try contacting someone else. Thank you.
Shouldn’t you be working right now instead?
This chat is for company business only. I have no business with you.
Do you not have better things to do? Quit wasting my time.
Don’t you ever give up? Do not answer that. I need to work. Goodbye.
I need to work and so do you. Bye.

random_set.msg: I do not feel comfortable discussing exactly how much I make. You clearly know nothing. Prove me wrong and tell me my exact salary.
If you are attempting to get me to divulge my salary, your efforts are in vain. I have nothing to explain to you. What do you think my salary is?
How much I make is none of your business. I am certain your estimation would be wildly incorrect but you are welcome to guess my salary.

sequence.msg: Oh really? Where did you get that information?
You really shouldn’t be spreading gossip like this.
Whatever. You clearly have communication issues. I’m obviously not making that much money. I have work to do. Goodbye.

msg: I don't have time for your questions.

sequence.msg: I don't really even know how to respond. Figure it out yourself.

Here's a free piece of advice, new hire: don't get in my way. I'm rising through the ranks of this company faster than a SpaceX rocket. Your friend Christopher would do well to do the same. Now get back to work.
Whatever. Just know that I'm the top dog around here and Delores' right-hand man. Stick with me and I'll take you to the top. Now get back to work.

msg: I do not have time for you. Message someone else.
